tool_description: Create trackable QR codes with insights into unique visitors, total scans, time and day of scan.
name: QR Code + Tracking Statistics and Analytics
title: QR Code + Tracking Statistics and Analytics
tool_name: QR Code + Tracking Statistics and Analytics

api_list.name: Check Active QR Codes
api_list.description: See all your active QR Codes and the number of scans.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-tracking-statistics-and-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/v1/api/myqrs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-tracking-statistics-and-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-tracking-statistics-and-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/v1/api/myqrs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-tracking-statistics-and-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
